hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{11} \text{ will have chocolate ice cream}\\
+&  \underline{\,\,\,\blue6 \text{ will have vanilla ice cream}}\\
=&\pink{17} \text{ students in the class}\end{align}$

question.content:
My whole first grade class is eating ice cream today! $11$ students are having chocolate ice cream and $6$ other students are having vanilla.

**How many students are in my class? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] students
